main event: A large, bright, red object with small windows and yellow lights was spotted in a hay field near Union, Pennsylvania on July 11, 1966.
interesting points: The object was illuminated with a yellow-orange color and a grinding noise was noticed coming from inside it.
The witnesses noticed a tremendous amount of static on their car radio when approaching the area.
The object disappeared and reappeared in the same spot.
The witnesses reported the incident to the state police, who were uncooperative and questioned their mental condition.
The Air Force conducted an investigation, but the witnesses could not find any physical evidence at the site.
sighted object: a large, bright, red object with small windows and yellow lights
witnesses: Mr. and Mrs. S___, Mr. and Mrs. C___, and their children
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
